'''''eitha-''''' is a [[Sindarin]] word given three different meanings:

#"to ease, assist" (root [[ATH]]; cognates: [[Quenya]] ''[[asya-]]'', ''[[asië]]'')<ref name=PE148>{{PE|Eldarin}}, p. 148</ref>
#"to prick with a sharp point, to stab"<ref name=WJ>{{HM|WJ}}, p. 365</ref>
#"to treat with scorn, insult"<ref name=WJ/>
